content.prompt:
A negatively charged conductor attracts a second object. The second object could be which of the following?

I. A conductor with positive net charge

II. A conductor with zero net charge

III. An insulator with zero net charge

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
